Essay: 5: the reason why i am a biology major is to become a doctor. Many online resources recommend biology to prepare you the basics to enter medical school. Honestly biology can be some what boring but there are times that its fascinating. Why do i want to go into my major its to become what i want to be.a doctor and it will help me prepare myself to to so.

Why do I want to go into my major? there are various reasons for this. Some of these reasons are that I find science interesting. I also find my major to be quite challenging. There is also the fact that with my major I could benefit the human race as a whole ,and leave my mark on this world before I depart. Its a degree that is vary capable of taking me different routes, whether it is MED school, research, teaching, etc. It is also something that has the possibility of more stability that some other jobs, and decent pay. But the main reason is for my family now and the future. So I may make my parents proud, help them through retirement and help my future wife and kids by having that steady job I love. only then will I be able to be happy. ONce I finish my career.

"Why do I want to go into my major?"This essay is meant to remind you of your purpose. This is not meant to be a formal essay. It should be stream-of-conciousness writing from the heart. You will be graded on participation only, not on the specifics of what you say.  5 minutes of reflective journaling should result in an essay of about 150-200 words. I was in a comp sci major and have taken a lot of classes in college I think based off the classes and what I would want form the classes I would want to be in the major I am - biology physiology. I haven't taken my gwar or a UD physio course but I have taken other bio classes for this concentration. figuring out career options and other ideas on what I would want myself doing years from now... this major is a great fit for my career choice and the concentration has a lot of classes would benefit my future learning … which is why I am in the major I am in. the career I wanna pursue is to be an Obgyn or something in the medical field. I also think that I got into my major to be more self aware of how the world works in relation to science and society. I would love to take hed courses but I would have to declare a minor in it to take most of the classes I am interested in.

I want to be in the stem field because I want to go to medical school and then I want to become an obgyn. Being in stem has helped me look at different science classes and see what I like and what I don’t. My major is Biology concentration in Physiology I chose this major because one I like biology and that goes with my career pathway. I also wanted to concentrate it in physiology because I like physiology and I love that I can concentrate on it. Choosing my major was not hard at all coming into college I already knew what I wanted my major to be. I like all science classes and so far, my favorite has been Physics class, but I still have many more to take in the stem field.  I like being in the stem field and I can’t wait to continue my journey. Hopefully the classes just get better and better. I really hope that all of this happens. I know that this is a long and hard journey but if other people have done it than so can I. I just have to put my hard work, my mind and soul to this if this is what I truly want in life.

I want to go into the STEM field because I have always been interested in science. For the longest time i’ve always loved science. In elementary school science was my favorite subject and I was always eager to go to school just for science class. Till this day my science classes are my favorite to attend. Although they are the toughest classes, I still enjoy learning new information and gaining new concepts. I also chose the STEM field to get me prepared for my future career. I eventually want to become a Physician's Assistant or anything in the medical field that allows me to work with patients. I’ve always knew I wanted to work with people as I grew older. Originally I wanted to become general practitioner however that requires medical school and a lot of money. Physicians assistants do about the same and still get paid pretty well. I like that physicians assistants get to work with different specialities also. I feel that the STEM field prepares me and allows me to gain the knowledge that I would need to get to where I want to be. It will provide me with all the necessary information to become a physician's assistant.

Ever since I can remember I have always wanted to go into the STEM field. As a kid, I was always interested in science and it has always been a part of my life. More importantly environmental science, I think it is very important for people to be aware of the way we treat earth because our future does depend on it. Environmental science has a range of skills that could be important for future paths. If you choose a STEM Career there are so many career paths you can take which is what is so exciting about it, you also never stop learning because there is something new being discovered and there’s a lot of opportunity for growth which is very important to me because I always want to keep improving. I myself don’t know exactly what career path I want to take yet but I am interested in teaching, environmental advocacy, and resource management
